multiplechoiceresponse.label: According to the lecture, what is the purpose of the "pass" keyword in Python error handling?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: To catch and print an error message.
To catch an error without handling it further.
To exit the program if an error occurs.
To ignore all errors and continue execution.
